title: FedEx Revenue Rises but Labor Shortages Continue to Dent Business
sub_head: Delivery giant plans to repurchase an additional $5 billion of shares
body:
FedEx Corp. posted a 14% increase in revenue for its fiscal second quarter, as higher shipping rates helped offset rising costs from labor shortages.
The company said that it incurred $470 million in added expenses during the quarter ended Nov. 30 for things including higher wages for its staff and overtime.
